title: Kevin Stefanski can't coach vs. Steelers due to COVID-19 & can we please stop the Eagles outrage now? (Football 1/6)
description:
The first *pew-pew-pew* Brady Quinn Football Show of 2021 is here and it's a loaded one. Host Will Brinson and Brady address some rumors about Pete Prisco to start the podcast before getting to the real football stuff. The guys take a further look at GM and coach vacancies across the league and evaluate what organizations should aim for as they fill those jobs (4:00). Brady then dismisses most of the outrage directed at Doug Pederson and the Eagles over Sunday's game vs. Washington (20:30). BQ approaches the argument from a player's perspective and notes contradictions from the critics of what transpired. The Carson Wentz saga continues, as the guys take a look at the mental side of the once-promising QB, rather than his physical limitations from this season (29:00) Lastly, the Browns just can't catch a break (37:00). After an 18-year playoff drought Cleveland is finally back in the postseason, but will be without head coach Kevin Stefanski in the Wild Card Round vs. the Steelers due to COVID-19. Brady offers a glimmer of hope for desperate Browns fans and breaks down the impact of missing a head coach on game day.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @Brady_Quinn, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
